info.name: Paracentral lobule
info.description: The paracentral lobule is an area of cerebral cortex on the medial aspect of the hemisphere that includes medial extensions of the pre-central (motor) and post-central (somatosensory) gyri. The somatic representation here is for the lower extremity.
info.item: /Sections/Thin, Whole Brain/Sagittal & Parasagittal/1 Sag Thin Sec
